title: Generate a National Transit Database (NTD) Report
description: A transit agency must submit its monthly operating data to the federal government's National Transit Database (NTD).

tasks.description: Gather all required data for the month, including vehicle revenue miles, vehicle revenue hours, and ridership.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system queries multiple sources to get the required data points.

tasks.description: Validate the data for any anomalies or errors.
tasks.expected_outcome: The data is checked and confirmed to be reasonable.

tasks.description: Generate the NTD report in the federally specified format.
tasks.expected_outcome: A compliant report file is generated.

tasks.description: Submit the report file to the NTD portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The monthly compliance reporting is completed.
